body.raw:
## Introduction I primarily develop using TypeScript, React, and Node.js. While I enjoy learning new technologies, I strive to learn and use technologies that are appropriate for solving defined problems. I prefer working under well-designed problems and hypotheses. I hope to build value within a cycle of data-driven hypothesis validation, success, and failure. Ultimately, I want to live a life that creates good value in the world and shares positive energy, even if it's not grandiose. --- ## Experiences ### Karrot
Period
Sep 2022 ~ Present
Role
- Software Engineer, Frontend (Sep 2022 ~ Jan 2024) - Lead Software Engineer, Frontend (Jan 2024 ~ Present)
Projects
Small Business Advertiser Center, Professional Advertiser Center, Ad SDK, BFF
Tech Stack
typescript, react, relay, react-query, vanilla-extract, tailwindcss, node.js, fastify, graphql
#### Small Business Advertiser Center - Responsible for developing and maintaining the Small Business Advertiser Center. - Conducted various experiments needed for the Small Business Advertiser Center, such as providing recommended ad materials, adding radius targeting, and improving ad creation funnels. - Led the project to merge two separate codebases (web and webview) of the Small Business Advertiser Center into a single codebase. - Improved performance and quality by building a BFF and migrating code that was implemented as client resolvers for Relay usage. #### Professional Advertiser Center - Developed custom targeting features to allow advertisers to target or exclude specific audiences. - Worked on adding lead form ad products to help advertisers acquire more customer leads. #### SDK - Participated in developing an SDK that provides easy ad integration features for internal services within the Karrot app. - Developed and managed various SDKs used within the team, such as shared React components and Hooks libraries. ### BFF - Discussed and configured client-facing schemas separate from server models, and wrote GraphQL queries and mutations based on them. - Contributed to performance improvements by actively utilizing DataLoader for caching and batching functionality. - Participating in overall project restructuring, maintenance, and updates. #### Other - Developed a codemod SDK to facilitate smooth code-wide migrations. - Responsible for identifying and managing technical challenges needed within the team. - Regularly shared business or technical news and code snippets worth sharing within the team. - Regularly communicate with team members, helping their growth and checking for bottlenecks to solve problems. ### Korea Credit Data
Period
Jan 2021 ~ Sep 2022
Role
Product Engineer
Projects
MMP Internal Shared Library, CashNote Market, CashNote Market Partner Center, Credit Score Inquiry, CashNote 2.0
Tech Stack
typescript, react, next.js, tailwind, react-query, react-hook-form, react-testing-library, msw, jest, storybook, graphql, apollo-client
#### MMP (Marketing Management Platform) Internal Shared Library - Developed and deployed an internal shared library to npm so that web services wouldn't need to write data fetching logic and components every time they wanted to use materials registered in the MMP project that manages ad campaigns, ad groups, and materials. - Built a library that automatically generates UI forms for material render_types based on JSON-stored schemas. - Learned about additional considerations needed when writing code for shared use rather than code for a single project. - Beyond just working well, it needed to be user-friendly and meet desired use cases. I also learned that for users to use it well, good documentation and promotion are important beyond simply writing good code. #### CashNote Market - Participated in developing a marketplace service for business owners using CashNote. - Gained experience learning and using AWS services like ECS, Fargate, ALB, and CloudFront directly while actively utilizing Next.js for infrastructure. - Developed with consideration for providing the best user experience by appropriately using Next.js SSR, SSG, ISR, etc. - Worked on automating REST API request and response typing using OpenAPI specifications. - Developed the service while writing integration tests using technologies like Storybook, Jest, react-testing-library, and MSW. - Configured and implemented Segment event processing to check overall service metrics. Also proposed and implemented direct management of segmentation, funnels, user lifecycle, etc., in the Amplitude dashboard. #### CashNote Market Partner Center - Participated in developing a partner center for merchants entering the marketplace for business owners using CashNote. #### CashNote Credit Score Inquiry - Added a new feature to check business owners' credit scores through KCB. - Had the opportunity to learn about SVG and directly draw graphs showing scores. #### CashNote 2.0 - To solve the problem of slowing development speed due to increased complexity as the domain services I was responsible for grew, and to apply overall design improvements, I stopped development of CashNote 1.0 and proceeded with renewal to CashNote 2.0. - Used React experimental version and appropriately used Suspense (code splitting + data fetching) and Error Boundary to separate concerns and improve overall code quality. - Experienced using mobile interfaces to respond when used in in-app webviews. ### tPay
Period
Feb 2020 ~ Jan 2021
Role
Frontend Developer
Projects
Merchant Management/Contract Admin
Tech Stack
typescript, react, styled-component, swr, react-hook-form
#### Merchant Management/Contract Admin - Participated in developing features for registering and managing history when merchants had service issues, and for creating contracts with merchants and managing contract stages. - While handling many forms, I learned and experienced how to appropriately approach complex forms using React. ### StyleShare
Period
Apr 2019 ~ Feb 2020
Role
Frontend Developer
Projects
In-app Search Service, Web Store Renewal
Tech Stack
typescript, react, next.js, styled-component
#### In-app Search Service - Developed a new web service for search functionality to quickly try changes and experiments while operating the service as a webview within the app. - First time developing an in-app webview, I could feel the difference between developing in-app webviews and just developing web services, and learned related knowledge. #### Web Store Renewal - Since the StyleShare web store service had very old design and code, I proceeded with rebuilding it with React. ### Apartmentary
Period
Sep 2017 ~ Dec 2018
Role
Software Engineer
Projects
Landing Page, Back Office for Construction and Commerce, Product Information Crawling Chrome Extension, Interior Product Commerce
Tech Stack
javascript, react, redux, nodejs, express, mongodb
#### Landing Page - Renewed the landing page for interior construction requests using React. #### Back Office for Construction and Commerce - Participated in developing a back office that can manage interior construction requests, customer consultation records, and interior construction-related information. - Participated in developing a back office needed for commerce operations such as products, shipping, and payments. #### Product Information Crawling Chrome Extension - Participated in developing a tool that facilitates page crawling using a Chrome extension to make it easier to input products from other brands into commerce. - Learned that Chrome extensions can also be used to solve problems, not just web services, and had the experience of developing a Chrome extension directly. #### Interior Product Commerce - Participated in developing an interior product commerce exclusively for customers who received interior construction. - Experienced integrating payment using iamport. ### Spoqa
Period
Dec 2015 ~ Aug 2017
Role
Brand Success Manager, Business Intelligence Developer
Projects
Company-wide Data Dashboard Configuration, Contract Service Development, Query Writing for Data Extraction
Tech Stack
python, flask, sql
#### Company-wide Data Dashboard Configuration - Participated in writing SQL queries for visualization using Periscope so that service metrics could be checked company-wide. #### Contract Service Development - Participated in developing a service that manages DodoPoint service contracts. #### Query Writing for Data Extraction - Worked on supporting SQL query writing when receiving data extraction requests for service operations. - It was an experience that improved my SQL query writing and understanding. --- ## Communities ### Presentations - [Merging Web/WebView Code Doesn't Make Development 2x Faster? | 2024 Daangn Tech Meetup](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a26zrAqAAzo) (Oct 7, 2024) - [FEConf 2020: Handling Form State in Complex Back Office](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ycxqVYD2N0w) (Oct 31, 2020) ### Lecture - [Programmer FE Job Survival Kit](https://programmers.co.kr/learn/courses/12442) (Jul 2021 ~ Aug 2021) --- ## Education ### Kyung Hee University - (Mar 2010 ~ Feb 2016) Business Administration / Korean Language Studies
